entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed 'limit->OperGet() == GT_ARR_LENGTH' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #74785
    8.0.0
  • [Android] VectorSingle and VectorDoubleEqualsNonCanonicalNaNTest fails on Android x64 #74781
    8.0.0
  • Cleanup of third-party-notices files #74779
  • Arm64: RCPC, DC ZVA and probably RDM ISAs are never detected on win-arm64 #74778
    8.0.0
  • Consider updating tool for updating 3rd-party notices to be smarter about duplicates #74775
  • Assertion failed 'varDsc->lvDoNotEnregister || varDsc->lvIsMultiRegRet' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #74774
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(parentLoop.lpFlags & LPFLG_REMOVED) == 0' during 'Assertion prop' #74773
    7.0.0
  • String.Replace(char, char) now slower in some cases #74771
    7.0.0
  • JIT: get rid of shortName for phases #74768
    Future
  • Tool for updating 3rd-party notices should be more resilient to changes in dependencies #74766
  • runtime - Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #74765
    8.0.0
  • llvm-project - Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #74764
    8.0.0
  • How to install an ASP Core .NET 6 as windows service? #74759
  • BigInteger.Parse creates invalid instances from hex strings #74758
    8.0.0
  • Performance issue with ASP .NET 6.0 integration tests executed on .NET 7.0-preview #74756
  • [API Proposal] QuicError.AlpnInUse #74755
    8.0.0
  • Regression in the XmlBaseWriter.cs #74752
    7.0.0
  • Distributed transactions: TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction doesn't work #74745
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: SyncTableEntry::GetSyncTableEntry()[sbIndex].m_Object == obj #74741
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbNatLoopNum == loopNum' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #74739
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.InteropServices.Javascript #74734
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.Versioning #74733
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Net #74732
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\keepalive\\keepalive.cmd #74731
  • Test failure reflection/Tier1Collectible/Tier1Collectible/Tier1Collectible.sh #74730
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [System.Net.Http.Json] Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Net.Http.Json #72403
    7.0.0
  • CI failure: System.Globalization.Tests.InvariantModeTests.TestLastIndexOf, object reference not set to an instance of an object #74179
    7.0.0
  • firefox-DebuggerTests - TaskCanceledException in random tests #74640
    8.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Collections #72407
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Need to add support on Unix for recursive Crst #74680
  • LoggerMessageGenerator and JsonSourceGenerator not using incremental generator caching #74557
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.NegotiateAuthenticationKerberosTest asserts on Android #74708
    8.0.0
  • [ppc64le] New test RegexPcre2Tests added in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests testsuite is failing #74057
    Future
  • [ppc64le] Debug build only - Crash related to stack unwinding while running System.Runtime test case #74069
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json.Tests Fails on Android #50868
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Functional.Tests fails on Android #50866
    Future
  • DateTime.Now.ToString("yyyy/MM/dd") is not working #74737
  • [wasm] `System.Runtime` tests failing with uncaught exception on Windows/AOT/chrome #72752
    8.0.0
  • Add support for the s390x architecture #34195
    Future
  • TarReader stops enumerating entries when stream is unseekable #74728
  • [NativeAOT] Fail if a ILCompiler package runtime major version is different from target runtime #74387
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.GetExportCookie #74120
    Future
  • F# compiler crashes with DOTNET_TieredPGO=1 #74295
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • CI: Fix helix test results reporting #74788
    blocking, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix incorrect "illegal XML comment chars" check & add regression tests #74787
    area-System.Xml
  • Add missing System.Formats.Tar docs #74786
    area-System.IO
  • Delete a bit more `OBJ(ADDR(...))` wrapping from `impNormStructVal` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move more legs out of runtime-staging #74783
  • [Android] Skip VectorSingle and VectorDoubleEqualsNonCanonicalNaNTest on x64 #74782
    area-System.Numerics
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Preference sources of copy-like casts to destinations #74777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction() #74776
    area-System.Transactions
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] enable background GC on Unix #74772
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Discourage using explicit package references to ILCompiler to publish… #74769
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix `JSExport` on struct and records #74763
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74762
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES file #74760
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Fix Linux armv6 build on runtime-community.yml #74757
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm][test] install handlers for unhandled exceptions on browser #74751
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Unload MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources. #74749
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/7.0] Move distributed transaction test to OleTxTests #74748
    area-System.Transactions
  • [SocketException]: New Constructor with string? for SocketException #74744
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Sort out side of GetChildKeys #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add Nick to area-owners.json #74761
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] Use System.Numerics.IEqualityOperators.op_Equality in SpanHelper.T.cs where possible. #74738
    area-System.Memory
  • [wasm] Move `src/tests/BuildWasmApps/*` to `src/mono/wasm` #74698
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add missing System.Net.Http.Json API docs #74770
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add missing System.Collections API docs #74767
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix signature for 64-bit delegate profiling helper #74743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] do not do shutdown for the main thread on Windows #74712
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [QUIC] Root listener/connection while waiting on new connection/stream event #74740
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix chinese character in project name #74516
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Move distributed transaction test to OleTxTests #74747
    area-System.Transactions
  • [NativeAOT] enable background GC on Unix #74735
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable firefox debugger tests for rolling builds #74753
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Disable KerberosExecutor on LinuxBionic, it doesn't have GSSAPI libraries #74709
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Discourage using explicit package references to ILCompiler to publish #74591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ppc64le bug fixes #74746
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Use System.Numerics.IEqualityOperators.op_Equality in SpanHelper.T.cs where possible. #74567
    area-System.Memory, runtime-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add Nick to fabric-bot config #74666
    area-Meta
  • #50866 enable configuration functional test on android #74651
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • #50868 enable configuration json tests on Android #74647
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Add support for indefinite length arrays #74215
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Annotate System.Runtime.Serialization for AOT warnings #74663
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Mark UnmanagedCallersOnlyTest as NativeAOT incompatible #74546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Retry logic for distributed transactions test #74648
    area-System.Transactions, 8.0.0
  • Fix mentioned default value of DOTNET_TC_OnStackReplacement_InitialCounter #74729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix signature for 64-bit delegate profiling helper #74500
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Add WaitAsync functionality to Background Service #74789
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [ARM64] - JitDisasm - Make zero values and commas consistent #74717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use nproc without --all on Linux #74696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Clean up SuperPMI collection scripts #74598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing reducing CI load #74601
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • improve hanling of TLS certificates on Linux #74695
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Fix json Serializer (all Proprties should be used) #73121
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74692
  • Skip System.Net.Requests tests on mono linux-arm64 #74668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Split Codespaces configuration based on development scenarios #74683
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] JS interop without JS code gen - CSP friendly #74441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 intrinsics for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #74634
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • Mark certain compiler-created locals as aliased #74665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Only widen short local stores #74685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete `lvPromotedStruct` #74702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Disallow `ASG(..., IND<struct>)` before morph #74715
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix two auto-atomicity Regex bugs #74726
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74638
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Reuse shared invoker and throw on incompatible WebSocket options #74473
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cross-compile cross-compilers for non-x64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix RegexOptions.NonBacktracking matching end anchors at timeout check boundaries #74525
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • fix: [Wasm] Adjust windows build #70689
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Log exit codes in browser samples to prevent tests from timeouting #74637
  • Fix possible stack overflow in HttpListener #74644
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #74669
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: packages not building or publishing #1970

PullRequests

Created

  • Make sure we don't select the first cold runtime function into the last hot method #1974
  • Update the test infra scripts #1973

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: upgrade DevOps agent as win2016 is deprecated #1972
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add option to disable the RyuJIT backend #1971

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Easy way to determine the "Default" language version #27535
  • Update test once runtime AOT target changes are in the SDK repo #27533
  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #27532
  • [NetSDKE2E] Error "does not verify: no digest" occurs when installing SDK 6.0.401 on RedHat 8.6 #27523

Closed

  • HttpClient fails to connect over SSL when running `dotnet 3.1` on Fedora:36 #27360
  • NETSDK1152 "multiple publis h output files with the same relative path" with completely different paths coming from NuGet package #27536
  • Incorrect parsing of msbuild parameters #27526

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #27542
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Backport of https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/pull/27510 #27541
    Area-CodeFlow, 7.0.1xx
  • Hot reload script injection improvements #27537
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • apicompat: sort suppressions #27500
    Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Update AOT test #27334
    Area-ILLink
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test for framework trimming warnings #27461
    Area-ILLink
  • Moved the options to new \ new create level #27455
    area: dotnet new
  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    Area-Templates
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1973416 #27439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Added `new` to the list of commands to track the second verb #27457
    area: dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27479
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #63645
  • Refactoring Suggestion: Change Signature for Type Parameters #63644
  • New Rename UI it too bright in dark theme :) #63643
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow adding `scoped` or removing `[UnscopedRef]` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #63656
    Area-Compilers
  • Account for using declarations in nested switch statement gotos #63655
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert To Record Refactoring/Code Fix initial offering #63654
    Area-IDE
  • Don't include syntax tree's contents when throwing NFWs #63653
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix potential deadlock if we are previewing a rename change #63652
    Area-IDE
  • Delete publishing steps that are no longer needed #63651
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63649
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Refactoring constructor initializers to use primary constructors #63648
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Report an error for an unsupported type tests involving 'ref' structs. #63646
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Snap main to release/dev17.4 #63657
    Area-IDE
  • Use correct branch until VS snaps #63658
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update configs for 17.4p2 snap #63647
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add Newtonsoft.Json 13.0.1 dependency to InternalTools.props #63650
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add telemetry for the time and files outputted for source generators #63088
    Area-IDE
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Use 'checked' names for synthesized vb intrinsic operators #63604
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Revert - Don't allow parameter type changes on properties #63642
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Update CodeAnalysis.Testing dependency #63416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #63402
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Convert workspaces and new document formatting integration tests to new framework #63610
    Area-IDE
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Add support for delete parameter intent #63546
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #63632
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Do not return awaited void task in "Introduce local" refactoring #63385
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Delete Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.Desktop #63624
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable nullable in C# keyword recommenders and their tests #63639
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Add more telemetry for rename #61370
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor entry point finder code #60614
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Kestrel TimingPipeFlusher calling WriteAsync when another write is pending, causing an exception (SSL) #43625
  • Support for custom authentication scheme without adding data protection #43624
  • Possible race condition in RemoteRenderer #43621
    7.0-rc2
  • SignalR C++ Client read access violation from signalr_client_config destructor #43617
  • React template should use UTF-8 #43616
  • Quic stream completion races with `Abort` #43614
  • Render image for static files logged in console browser 404 #43613

Closed

  • w3wp.exe Faulting Application Exception Code 0xc0000409 #43378
  • Perf regression: plaintext #43606
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 3): Session/Auth #42092
    7.0-rc2
  • join the organization #43622
  • Make it simpler for customers to investigate Blazor Auth issues #39412
    7.0-rc1
  • Browser Link Errors after Disconnect #43571
  • Blazor WASM - TypeError: Window.fetch: HEAD or GET Request cannot have a body. #43602
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_actix, fortunes_dapper #43601
  • [Feature Request]: Make LinkGenerator support complex objects #43572
  • Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #43523
    8.0-alpha1

PullRequests

Created

  • Pin language version in release branch #43629
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Pin language version in release branch #43628
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update UpdatingMajorVersionAndTFM.md #43627

Merged

  • fix #43523 Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #43558
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • docs: Remove syntax error in xml docs for `AuthenticationBuilder` #43575
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1

Updated

  • [SignalR] Fix bug when combining streaming and client results #43552
    area-signalr
  • [release/7.0] Add and use RDF.InferMetadata and update new PopulateMetadata API #43543
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1974269 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43596
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #3326

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix linux-musl-arm64 RID in dbgshim package #3327

Updated

  • Sync eng/native from runtime #3318

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Key Status in MAUI Desktop #9764
  • MenuBar/MenubarItem does not bind to commands #9762
  • Shell flyout does not update when item selected from shell tab #9761
  • Polyline - Fill Not Working on Triangle or Any Shape #9759
  • VisualStates are not being applied to items in a CollectionView using DataTemplates in Release Mode #9756
  • APT2259 Incompatible with Attribute Resource (attr) Reference is not Verbose #9755
  • Setting 'CanExecute' doesn't change the status of Button controls when they are bound to MVVM Commands #9753
  • Cant Update MenuBarItem Height (<Shell.MenuBarItems>) #9752
  • Shell navigation not called and updated for top tabs #9750
  • Changing CarouselView Position has no effect until it is set >0 and back to 0 when loop is disabled #9749
  • Preferences.Get() returns default type value instead of defaultValue parameter value #9748
  • Path resouces cannot be consumed multiple times via StaticResource #9747
  • Add or publicly document msbuild variable to control XAML Hot Reload tooling #9745
  • CarouselView displaying views through DataTemplate throws exception when loop is enabled #9744
  • [Android] Content wrapped in NavigationPage objects in Tabbed Page dissapears after tabs navigating #9743
  • Canvas background on iOS isn't transparent #9740
  • .NET MAUI - Picker.ItemsSource does not update the picker after being manually set. #9739
  • Title Bar Main 3 buttons don't work as expected #9737
  • Can't Change Shell FlyoutBackgroundColor From a Theme Style File...again #9736
  • Button with image not scaling to HeightRequest on iOS and Android #9734

Closed

  • Binding to WebView.Source with empty string causing blank screen on Android #9751
  • Splash screen on Samsung S20 Android 12 #7645
  • Button/ImageButton has space between button and border in its corner #7128
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Top Navigation Menu bar does not show up on MAUIBlazor deployed to iPhone with iOS 15.6 #9693
  • MAUI Razor Component CSS not compiling on iOS local device (iPhone) #9723
  • Using a custom configuration to publish Android app #9627
    Backlog
  • Hostname not verified when sending request on Android #8518
  • HttpClientHandler ClientCertificate property is null on Android #8860
  • Native Crash when BindingContext is used on iOS Simulator #9683
  • Can't deploy my application #9711
  • 运行第一个demo时报错 #9732
  • 运行第一个demo时报错 #9733
  • [Windows] project path containing substed drives causes DEP0700 (AppxManifest.xml not found) during launch of desktop app - android is OK #9611
  • [Windows] HTML select options are not properly displayed in WebView #9579
  • Machine hangs while building a .NET MAUI App - Observed even in a basic project created from the template #9652

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Fix Shadow rendering on iOS Border (#8464)" #9760
    area/controls 🎮
  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758
  • Try fix API docs #9757
    area/docs 📓
  • Update docs animations #9746
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Update Rollback.in.json #9763

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to use a custom function in the extended function "Select" of IQueryable #28914

Closed

  • EF7 should work with SQLite version that is included in Windows and older Ubuntu LTS #28776
    7.0.0
  • Concurrency Check #28896
  • Stop scaffolding DbSet initialization to `null!` #26877
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Mixed TPH and TPC #28917

PullRequests

Created

  • SQLite Query: Fix more DateOnly/TimeOnly cases #28918

Merged

  • Fall back to non-RETURNING updates with old Sqlite #28911
  • Stop scaffolding DbSet initializers #28684
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Update BenchmarkDotNet version #28901
  • Support sproc input/output parameters on non-concurrency-token properties #28908

PullRequests

Merged
